Spears::

She heard his words and tried to think. She remembered a few bits of 
what happened, but most of it had been erased.  

She spoke, but still ckoking back the tears. "I really don't remember 
anything. I think I remember something about...about..a cage..Striker 
was in it."  She wiped her eyes and tried to think. "I recall 
something about...a..bot in charge..." she shook her head and looked 
at Firearm with tears still running down her face, "That's all I 
know." She started to ckoke up again. "I'm sorry." 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm sighs, sitting down next to Spears. "But any information 
you 
> could give us about the Trainers could help get Striker back, if 
its 
> possible."
> 
> He was feeling sorry for her, but he didn't know the pain of losing 
> someone you love, other than family.
> 
> "Maybe you know what they did to him?"
> 
>
